Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Condition.participant.actor (actor)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-referenceElement `Condition.participant.actor` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Condition.participant` requires a cross-version extension. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Condition.participant.actor` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Condition.participant.actor` has a context of Condition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Condition`.

name: R5ConditionElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Condition to FHIR R4 Condition
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Condition to FHIR R4.
